thread.title: Heather Guess Kemp
thread.title_full: Templatemonster reviewed by Heather Guess Kemp

author: Heather Guess Kemp
title: Heather Guess Kemp
text: Grace was AMAZING! She was patience and not frustrated by my lack of technological understanding. It's rare to find someone who can help you SO THOROUGHLY via chat. She was beyond what I expected and I wish all the help I get when building websites to be this good!
